review: I bought this in addition to my Chromecast because I really wanted to access Acorn TV.  Setting up was straightforward but time consuming when it came to authorizing channels such as HBO and ESPN.  The reason I cannot give this more than 3 stars is the remote.  Within a couple of weeks it would stop functioning and the only way to restart it seemed to be to remove and replace the batteries.  This could happen multiple times in the same viewing session. From research online many others have had similar problems.  Eventually the remote stopped working altogether.  I followed the troubleshooting steps from the Roku website - first self-guided and then walking through it in chat with the Roku tech support online.  The tech decided I needed an new remote which arrived in about 3 days and seemed to solve the problem (time will tell).  Unfortunately the troubleshooting process involves doing a factory reset so you lose connection to your WiFi and all your channel authorizations - and of course you cannot get that back up and running until you have a working remote.  Kudos to Roku for replacing the remote quickly (and for being available at midnight) but I think if this happens again I shall just use the remote app on my Android phone.
